title: Define Detailed Project Requirements and User Stories (Revised)
description: This task involves gathering, documenting, and refining detailed functional and non-functional requirements for the NeuroDiversityAssistant. This will include creating comprehensive user stories that outline potential scenarios of user interactions with the system, focusing on accessibility, usability, effectiveness, and responsiveness specifically tailored to individuals with neurodevelopmental disorders. The documentation should also address error handling, performance optimization, scalability, security considerations, and provide clear examples of edge cases and exceptional situations. Additionally, the documentation should emphasize the importance of user feedback and iterative design to ensure the system remains useful and effective over time.

title: Design system architecture
description: Create a high-level design of the NeuroDiversityAssistant, including frontend and backend components, database schema, APIs, and any necessary third-party integrations.
dependencies: Define project requirements and user stories

title: Develop frontend interface
description: Design and implement the graphical user interface (GUI) for the NeuroDiversityAssistant, ensuring it is accessible and easy to navigate.

title: Implement backend services
description: Develop the server-side logic and APIs for the NeuroDiversityAssistant, including data processing, storage, and communication with third-party services.

title: Develop machine learning models
description: Train and integrate AI models to assist individuals with neurodevelopmental disorders in daily life and communication.

title: Integrate with third-party services
description: Establish connections and APIs to integrate the NeuroDiversityAssistant with external systems such as calendars, reminders, and communication tools.

title: Perform security audits and testing
description: Conduct security assessments to ensure the NeuroDiversityAssistant is secure and user data is protected.

title: Write technical documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the NeuroDiversityAssistant, detailing its architecture, APIs, usage instructions, and troubleshooting guides.

title: Conduct unit testing and integration tests
description: Perform functional and non-functional tests to ensure the NeuroDiversityAssistant is working correctly and meets project requirements.
